verses.verse: Bel <S%H1078><s%> bows down <S%H3766><s%>, Nebo <S%H5015><s%> stoops <S%H7164><s%>, their idols <S%H6091><s%> were upon the animals <S%H2416><s%>, and upon the cattle <S%H929><s%>: your carriages <S%H5385><s%> were heavily loaded <S%H6006><s%>; they are a burden <S%H4853><s%> to the weary animal <S%H5889><s%>.

They stoop <S%H7164><s%>, they bow down <S%H3766><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>; they could <S%H3201><s%> not deliver <S%H4422><s%> the burden <S%H4853><s%>, but themselves <S%H5315><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>.

Listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which are borne <S%H6006><s%> by me from the belly <S%H990><s%>, which are carried <S%H5375><s%> from the womb <S%H7356><s%>:

And even to your old age <S%H2209><s%> I am he <S%H7872><s%>; and even to gray hairs will I carry <S%H5445><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>: I have made, and I will carry <S%H5375><s%>; even I will carry <S%H5445><s%>, and will deliver you <S%H4422><s%>.
To whom will you compare <S%H1819><s%> me <S%H7737><s%>, and make me equal, and compare <S%H4911><s%> me <S%H1819><s%>, that we may be like?

They lavish <S%H2107><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> out of the bag <S%H3599><s%>, and weigh <S%H8254><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> in the balance <S%H7070><s%>, and hire <S%H7936><s%> a goldsmith <S%H6884><s%>; and he makes <S%H6213><s%> it a god <S%H410><s%>: they fall down <S%H5456><s%>, Yes <S%H7812><s%>, they worship.

They carry <S%H5375><s%> him upon the shoulder <S%H3802><s%>, they carry <S%H5445><s%> him <S%H3240><s%>, and set him in his place, and he stands <S%H5975><s%>; from his place <S%H4725><s%> shall he not remove <S%H4185><s%>: Yes <S%H6817><s%>, one shall cry unto him <S%H6030><s%>, yet can he not answer, nor save <S%H3467><s%> him out of his trouble <S%H6869><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> this <S%H377><s%>, and show yourselves men: bring it again <S%H7725><s%> to mind <S%H3820><s%>, O you transgressors <S%H6586><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the former things <S%H7223><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>: for I am God <S%H410><s%>, and there is none else <S%H430><s%>; I am God, and there is none <S%H657><s%> like me <S%H3644><s%>,

Declaring <S%H5046><s%> the end <S%H319><s%> from the beginning <S%H7225><s%>, and from ancient times <S%H6924><s%> the things that are not yet done <S%H6213><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, My counsel <S%H6098><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%>, and I will do <S%H6213><s%> all my pleasure <S%H2656><s%>:

Calling <S%H7121><s%> a ravenous bird <S%H5861><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%>, the man <S%H376><s%> that executes my counsel <S%H6098><s%> from a far <S%H4801><s%> country <S%H776><s%>: Yes <S%H1696><s%>, I have spoken it <S%H935><s%>, I will also bring it to pass <S%H3335><s%>; I have purposed it <S%H6213><s%>, I will also do it.
Listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H47><s%>, you stouthearted, that are far from <S%H7350><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%>:

I bring near <S%H7126><s%> my righteousness <S%H6666><s%>; it shall not be far off <S%H7368><s%>, and my salvation <S%H8668><s%> shall not wait <S%H309><s%>: and I will place <S%H5414><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%> my glory <S%H8597><s%>.
